channel.title: myPlayer.name -Trading Issue [PI]
channel.description:
Lets say: player1= USER player2= DANNY
When USER trades DANNY, it will say "DANNY wishes to trade with you." When it should say USER wishes to trade with you.
[code] pushMessage(myPlayer.name +" wishes to trade with you.", 4, s3); [/code] Before it didn't have the myPlayer.name and it just said "wishes to trade with you.". So I added the myPlayer.name thinking that it was going to work... What's wrong with this?

item.title: myPlayer.name -Trading Issue [PI]

And how do I do that…?
[/quote]

		Client otherPlayer = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[player];

_>[/quote]
Where do I add this:confused:

Read full topic

item.title: myPlayer.name -Trading Issue [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Mr_x1 Mr...x..
item.description:
@Mr_x1 wrote:

Lets say:
player1= USER
player2= DANNY

When USER trades DANNY, it will say “DANNY wishes to trade with you.” When it should say USER wishes to trade with you.

pushMessage(myPlayer.name +" wishes to trade with you.", 4, s3);

Before it didn’t have the myPlayer.name and it just said “wishes to trade with you.”. So I added the myPlayer.name thinking that it was going to work… What’s wrong with this?

Read full topic
